title: IMB Foundations: All Languages
description:
Foundations answers the fundamental questions of who the International Mission Board (IMB) is, what we do, and how our Core Values, Core Convictions, and Missiological Convictions affect how we live and work around the world.

Discover how these foundational answers seek to serve Southern Baptists in reaching the nations, together, to fulfill the vision of a great multitude from every nation, tribe, people, and language knowing and worshiping our Lord Jesus Christ (Revelation 7:9).
subject: Foundations

title: IMB Foundations Companion Guide PDF
description:
Build upon what you learned in Foundations with the eight-lesson Foundations Companion Guide. Tailored for pastors, leaders, and church members, this guide applies the principles and teachings of Foundations, focusing on the six components of the missionary task. Discover how these principles extend beyond overseas missions to impact your congregation and community.

Designed for collaborative learning, use this guide to engage with another church member or small group within your church. We recommend reading Foundations before or alongside this guide.
subject: Foundations

title: Groundwork Foundations Book
description:
Laying Foundations for Biblical Missions

The ultimate point of the mission of God is that all peoples of the earth would know God and recognize His glory being displayed most perfectly in His Son, Jesus Christ. God’s plan for His mission includes working through His redeemed people, the Church, to declare His glory—the weight of His perfect presence and character—and to make disciples of all nations.

As you journey through these pages, we pray you grow in your understanding of the mission of God and how He purposes the people of God to join Him in His redemptive plan—that a great multitude from every nation, tribe, people, and language will know and worship our Lord Jesus Christ (Revelation 7:9).
subject: Foundations

title: IMB Foundations Kit
description:
Grow in your understanding of the International Mission Board (IMB) and how our missionary presence engages lostness among the nations through the missionary task. This essential kit includes:   

IMB Foundations, which answers questions of who the IMB is, what we do, and how our Core Values, Core Convictions, and Missiological Convictions affect how we live and work around the world. 
IMB Foundations Companion Guide, an eight-lesson guide designed to accompany Foundations for pastors, leaders, and church members to implement the missionary task in their own congregations and communities.
The Missionary Task prayer card, featuring prayer points for each of the six components of the missionary task for your church and community, the International Mission Board, and your IMB missionaries around the world.  
IMB Training Resource Guide, quick-reference guide can help you explore transformational training resources—including courses and events.
Missionary Task Sticker, a visual reminder of the six components of the missionary task—entry, evangelism, discipleship, healthy church formation, leadership development, and exit to partnership.
subject: Foundations

title: What is the Missionary Task? - Micro Course
description: What is the Missionary Task? Micro course
subject: Missions

title: A Voice for the Nations: A Course on Prayer
description: This self-guided course on prayer will help you and your church grow in your understanding and practice of prayer and learn how to effectively engage in intercession for the unengaged and unreached nations of the world.
subject: Prayer

title: The Missionary Task and the Local Church - Micro Course
description: The Missionary Task and the Local Church - Micro Course
subject: Missions

title: Deepen Discipleship  Course (English)
description: Deepen Discipleship is a six-month course that is designed to be done with a mentor or small group in the context of your local church. As you walk through the lessons, you’ll read and do activities designed to help you develop or deepen habits of obedience in your Christian life. You'll also walk through the entire New Testament and learn to see your whole life in light of the gospel.
subject: Discipleship

title: Discipulado Profundo (Deepen Discipleship) Course (Spanish)
description: Discipulado Profundo es un curso de 6 meses diseñado para que lo hagas con un mentor o un grupo pequeño de tu iglesia local. A medida que vas haciendo las lecciones, leerás y realizarás las actividades diseñadas para ayudarte a desarrollar y/o profundizar hábitos de obediencia en tu vida cristiana. También, caminarás a través del Nuevo Testamento y aprenderás a ver como el evangelio afecta toda tu vida.
subject: Discipleship

title: Short-Term Trip Training Course
description: This course is designed to help church-based mission teams prepare for mission trips as we reach the nations, together. The seven lessons may be studied over a concentrated training weekend or spread over a few months leading up to the trip. Participants work through the material on their own and then come prepared to share what they've learned in a team meeting.
subject: Discipleship

title: Short-Term Trip Training Leader’s Guide Course
description: This course is designed to help church-based mission teams prepare for mission trips as we reach the nations, together. The seven lessons may be studied over a concentrated training weekend or spread over a few months leading up to the trip. Participants work through the material on their own and then come prepared to share what they've learned in a team meeting.
subject: Preparation for Going

title: World Religions
description: Together, we seek to take the gospel to every nation, tribe, people, and language. We hope this World Religions Overview will serve as a tool to help you better engage the lost people around you with the life-changing news of the gospel.
subject: World Religions

title: Meet Muslims Course
description: In this brief course, you’ll discover what Muslims believe (along with helpful questions you can ask them about spiritual matters), where Muslims live around the world, and how you can share the good news of Jesus Christ with them in meaningful and impactful ways.
subject: World Religions

title: IMB Training Resources
description:
The International Mission Board (IMB) is dedicated to equipping believers for impactful and transformative mission work through a training approach that is outcomes-driven and focused on real-world application. This approach engages participants in an interactive learning experience, with a strong emphasis on discipleship that fosters obedience to the faith.

IMB offers a diverse array of courses and resources designed to empower individuals and teams for mission service.

In the near future, new resources will be available, including specialized courses on Hermeneutics and NextGen/Youth ministry.

Alongside these self-paced courses, IMB also hosts live events like the Senders Summit and Missions College, providing valuable opportunities for networking, skill-building, and hands-on training for effective mission work.
subject: Resources
